org.grobid.core.utilities.crossref

Class CrossrefRequestListener<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grobid.core.utilities.crossref.CrossrefRequestListener<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CrossrefRequestTask, GluttonRequestTask

    public class CrossrefRequestListener<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Listener to catch response from a CrossrefRequest.
